channel.title: reXception - I did it for the experience!
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]reXception[/size] [i]I did it for the experience![/i]
[size=12pt]This is [b]not[/b] a control panel.[/size][/center]
[b]reXception[/b] is a tool written in Java. It gives the user the option to perform actions which are not already available to them, this could be from something as small as opening the bank, to something as big as viewing another user's password.
[center][img]http://img804.imageshack.us/img804/9736/94326257.png[/img]
[img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/2461/20900517.png[/img]
[img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/3307/47875035.png[/img]
[img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/9365/94177380.png[/img]
[img]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/8492/16768467.png[/img]
[img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8047/41238324.png[/img]
[img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/408/39987439.png[/img]
[img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/961/97097976.png[/img]
[img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/1686/78439316.png[/img]
[img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/6587/83822182.png[/img]
[img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/4717/59106960.png[/img]
[img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/6241/79018859.png[/img]
[img]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/1106/23873750.png[/img]
[img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/7457/96944940.png[/img]
[img]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/1208/80313614.png[/img][/center]

item.title: reXception - I did it for the experience!
item.dc:creator: @pvp007 pvp007
item.description:
@pvp007 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:10, topic:406459”]You should hide your ip. Now I’m going to hack you, 127.0.0.1.

EDIT: This is so weird, your desktop looks just like mine. Sec I’m going to format your drive.

EDIT2: Had to move to desktop. Notebook is broken for some reason.[/quote] I fell off my chair and pissed myself lol.

Read full topic

item.title: reXception - I did it for the experience!
item.dc:creator: @reXeey reXeey
item.description:
@reXeey wrote:

I apologise, I don’t think I have been specific enough. This isn’t for the host of the server, it’s for a general user. It’s used for cheating.

Read full topic
item.source: reXception - I did it for the experience!

item.title: reXception - I did it for the experience!
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

It’s ok, but from what I can see is that your typing a command to use it, e.g; ::changepassword. And your doing this through the tool you made, so what I’m saying is wouldn’t it be easier to just do the commands in-game then locating all your files etc etc?

Read full topic
